tool_description: Convert currencies using the latest exchange rates. See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/convertcurrency.
name: Currency Converter by API-Ninjas
title: Currency Converter by API-Ninjas

api_list.name: /v1/convertcurrency
api_list.description: API Ninjas Convert Currency API endpoint.

required_parameters.name: have
required_parameters.description: Currency you currently hold. Must be 3-character currency code (e.g. **USD**).

required_parameters.name: want
required_parameters.description: Currency you want to convert to. Must be 3-character currency code (e.g. **EUR**)
